d1_flags: 1. goto EF5F31 if GIYGAS_DEFEATED is set
d1_text:
Npc1288:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GIYGAS_DEFEATED L_EF5F31]
ï¿½Tenda who like to talk came to the Lost Underworld[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½because we couldn't stand the quiet up above.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½So, we established a separate tribe.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I hope we can be friendly again some day.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Yeah,[PAUSE 20] it was a lot easier to live up above.[HALT][END]
